front.title: IEC/IEEE Draft International Standard for Automatic Circuit Reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests, production tests and construction requirements for Overhead, Pad Mounted, Dry Vault, and Submersible Automatic Circuit Reclosers, cutout mounted reclosers and Fault Interrupters for Alternating Current Systems up to 38 kV
